title: Interpretation of a man’s dream of cashews in a dream in detail by senior interpreters

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about cashews for a man in a dreamToday and through the siteVariousWe will talk about the interpretation of a dream about cashews for a man in a dream, as scholars have interpreted the dream about cashews in a dream, indicating good nutrition, wealth and fortune.Interpretation of a dream about cashews for a single woman in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about cashews in one dream, as some scholars have interpreted it as An imminent marriage for this girl or success in her professional and academic life. Interpretation of a dream about cashews: A dream about cashews in a woman’s dream indicates longevity and nutrition. If the dreamer sees cashews, this indicates the good and good qualities that the dreamer has. But if he sees that the cashews are expired or inedible, it means losing a job or losing a lot of money and poverty. And God knows best. Interpretation of seeing nuts in a dream. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing nuts in a dream as great goodness, food, and wealth. It also indicates the good qualities that the dreamer has, and long life, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of seeing peanuts in a dream. Scientists based the interpretation of seeing peanuts in a dream. Peanuts in a dream indicate the abundance of sustenance that a person will obtain, but he will obtain it without fatigue or effort, and it also indicates that the dreamer has the qualities of kindness and generosity. Interpretation of a dream about cashews in a dream by Al-Nabulsi, as the scholar Al-Nabulsi explained that seeing cashews in a dream indicates the goodness that the dreamer will gain. It also indicates the upcoming happy news for that person, and it also indicates the loss that that person may suffer if that person has a job and wonderful plans, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about cashews for a married woman in a dream: It is known that cashews contain great benefits for the human body, including Including vitamins, and if a married woman sees that she is eating cashews, this means that she will give birth to a beautiful child with good morals, and her dreams and wishes will come true. One that she expected was impossible and I will obtain a large inheritance, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a dream about cashews for a pregnant woman in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about cashews for a pregnant woman in a dream, as it indicates that she will give birth to a child, male or female, according to what this pregnant woman desires. The fetus enjoys.Interpretation of a dream about cashews for a man in one dream. Scientists interpreted seeing cashews in a dream and eating them as a sign that the dreamer will soon be associated with a good woman with good morals. But if this bachelor is learning, this indicates success and success. However, if he sees himself distributing cashews, this indicates that he will invite people to rejoice from God. Interpretation of a dream about cashews for a divorced woman in a dream. Scientists have interpreted cashews in general as a good and plentiful diet for the dreamer. As for a divorced woman, if she sees herself eating cashews in her dream, this means that she will eliminate problems. that she faced in her professional life. And his personal life and eliminates debts, but if he sees walnuts scattered in it, it is not good, and now he shows an increase in problems and worries, and God Almighty knows best. The interpretation of eating peanuts in one dream. Scientists based on

title: The meaning of young children in a dream, interpretation of a dream about children

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing young male twins in a dream. Children. Children who play with me. Funny little children. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a young boy in a dream as an indication of a weak enemy who appears loyal and then shows his hostility. Whoever sees a boy who is good and sees in him what makes him happy is good and a blessing. He saw that a young child with a beautiful face was presented to him, then it is interpreted in two ways as a king and good news, if he is not raised in his arms, and if a young boy cries, then it is the loss of their worries, and it is said that the mind is troubled, and whoever sees a good young man, it is good and beneficial, It was said: Whoever sees that he is carrying a small child, it is better. Whoever carried a young child, and if he is sick, awake, or distressed, may God relieve his anxiety or imprison him, he is free. Interpretation of seeing children in a dream: Anyone who dreams that he has become a child is a sign of their lack of courage, and some have interpreted it as a sign of weakness and abandonment. Anxiety. Whoever sees that he is carrying a child in his arms, he will become responsible for a big task. Whoever dreams that he is born learning the Qur’an will repent for his sin. If you see young children in a school, this foretells that success and attention will bring you gifts. Whoever sees that he has given birth to a group of Children, it is a sign of the weight of worries, because children are difficult to raise easily. Seeing a boy in a dream can indicate kindness, comfort, and living. Whoever sees that he is buying a baby girl, this is a sign that he will suffer from anxiety. Whoever sees that he is buying a baby girl, this is a sign that he It will benefit him a lot. Whoever sees in his dream that he is selling a child, it is evidence that he is doing good to himself, and whoever dreams that he is selling a child is not good for him. If a woman sees a flabby child in her dream, this is an indication that she has a lot of good things depending on the beauty of the boy or Its ugliness. Whoever sees in his dream that he has a young male child dies. Whoever dreams that he is young and superior to men shows strength and help. Whoever dreams that his wife gives birth to a female, she will give birth to a male, and if he sees that he has given birth to a male, he will give birth to a female. Seeing a male in a dream indicates the presence of a male, It can indicate an increase in money and health, and in some interpretations it was said that children in a dream are a sign of anxiety and sadness. The scholar Ibn Shaheen interpreted the vision of a man wounding a male in a dream that he will be charged with money he obtained from children. If a woman sees that she is eating a child, this is a sign Although she is pregnant, and whoever sees that he is purifying a wet boy, it indicates two signs, one of which is spending on debt, or excessive money. The Nabulsi scholar explained that seeing children in a dream is a painful, inspiring, and disturbing matter, and that whoever carries a baby girl in his sleep and is imprisoned or tired will bear the pressure of worries and sorrows. And problems, in addition to the fact that a girl in a dream is a sign of distress and if a girl comes out of her mouth then this is a sign of many problems and fears. Seeing children in a dream can be the result of a desire to feel motherhood or have children. Seeing children in a dream may mean that there are some Matters that need more attention. Whoever sees that he is carrying a small child, it may indicate that there are some small worries

title: Interpretation of a dream about sarcastic laughter in a dream by Ibn Sirin in 5 minutes

preview.html: Dreaming of laughing sarcastic is one of the most painful and annoying dreams. Therefore, he evaluated the site in this article. Interpretation of a dream of sarcastic laughter in a dream, according to the opinion of major commentators, with all interpretations clarified according to the social status of the viewer. Interpretation of a dream of sarcastic laughter in a dream. Seeing laughter in a dream according to Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin indicates that the dreamer will suffer from severe sadness as a result of being exposed to some major problems. , in addition to the loss of a very important person to him. The interpretation of a dream about laughing sarcastically in a dream indicates the loss of something valuable to the dreamer, such as a job or the loss of money. This is how Imam Ibn Shaheen Al-Dhahiri said. The interpretation of a dream about sarcastically laughing in a dream is that the insight will hear some sad news, and it will His worries increase and he will not be able to overcome the problems he is exposed to. Laughter in a dream can also mean deep remorse as a result of some mistakes or wrong actions. Imam Abd al-Ghani al-Nabulsi believes that when a man laughs sarcastically in his dream, the meaning of this dream is that he will lose the bond in His life. Read also: Interpretation of water in a dream. Some contemporary interpreters have indicated that the interpretation of a dream about people laughing to mock the fortune teller indicates that his secret has been revealed and that his relationship has been revealed among the people. The person who laughs sarcastically at the fortune teller shows that this person is planning a conspiracy against the fortune teller and is trying to cause As much damage as possible to him, and it is possible that this person will be among those who show friendship and friendship with the fortuneteller. hex. Therefore, he must take care of those around him. A dream with people laughing sarcastically in a dream indicates the dreamer’s feeling of inferiority and lack of self-confidence, as well as some psychological pressure. Making fun of someone who sees someone in a dream indicates that there is a person with a bad character associated with him. Read also If a single girl sees herself laughing sarcastically in a dream, the interpretation of a dream about someone laughing at me mocking the single people here in the dream is that she is going through a nervous period due to family problems, academic failure, or emotional deprivation. If An unmarried girl saw that people around her were laughing sarcastically, the interpretation of dreams of someone laughing at me sarcastically about a single woman here in this dream shows that her issue has been exposed among the people and that her veil has been broken due to her commitment. A great sin. Laughter in a single girl’s dream without ridicule or interpretation of the dream. Laughter making fun of an unmarried girl is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicate that you are hearing some good news. When an unmarried girl sees herself laughing out loud in a public place, the interpretation of this dream is that she will have a happy occasion in the near future and people will know about this occasion. . Therefore, the interpretation could be a dream about someone laughing at me making fun of singles here. This dream means that he will succeed in an important academic stage or that he will get married soon. Read also: The best whitening and moisturizing cream for the body. Interpretation of a dream about laughing sarcastically in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees herself laughing,

title: Interpretation of a snake in a dream: Seeing a snake in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of a snake is for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a married or single man, whether it is a black, yellow, green bite, or small snakes. Interpretation of a snake in a dream. Snakes in a dream are often enemies or people who intend to harm you. Snakes may express the state of disappointment and failure that you are experiencing. Including seeing a large number of snakes and snakes in a dream located on a piece of land, a house, or a store, the dream indicates that the matter will return to life after leaving it or forgetting it. A water snake in a dream is a good omen and can indicate goodness and money. From the words of the snake in the dream, people will love it. He may see things in his life that he likes. A green snake in a dream does not harm him and indicates the presence of water in the place you saw in the dream, whether land or a house. There is often drinking water, repairing the water supply network, digging a well, or building a water wheel. Seeing a snake climbing up in the A dream may indicate joy and improvement in the dream’s circumstances. Killing a snake in a dream is a victory over enemies. Getting rid of fatigue or escaping from it in a dream can indicate escaping from something. Hearing the sound of a snake in a dream. Ibn Sirin says that a snake or snake in general in a dream indicates serious enmity depending on its size. And the extent of its poison, and that sometimes a snake can be a sultan and can be the wife of a child. Ibn Sirin says that if one sees a snake in his dream and that snake is loud and you approach it, this means that this person will suffer harm due to the extent of the bite that affected him in the dream. Interpretation of seeing a black snake. Experts in dream interpretation say that the black snake in a dream shows the cause of hostility, but from the family, while the white snake shows the malicious woman who has evil in her to harm her husband. But if a person sees in a dream that his wife has given birth to a snake, this means that his wife will give birth. A disobedient child, but if a person kills a snake in his bed, this indicates the death of his wife. Seeing a green snake in a dream Dream interpretation scholars say that the green snake symbolizes that there is someone who wants to get close to you, but this person is a great enemy to you and is waiting for an opportunity to take revenge on you. A man is trying to get rid of it. Interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake: As for the yellow snake in a dream, it shows many bad signs, such as a storm, and it also shows a lot of bad luck that a person is exposed to, but if a person sees in his dream that there is a yellow snake making a sound towards him and approaching him, that means That person will be exposed to the disease, but if one sees a white snake in his dream, this means that the person has recovered from the disease. Seeing small snakes in a dream Seeing small snakes in a dream, if the opinion is of a woman, means that she will give birth to a new baby, but this new baby He leaves her in a state of fear and trouble. The presence of a number of small snakes in homes indicates the presence of many worries and many problems, but if snakes climb on the furniture of the house or on the bed, this indicates a lot of problems.

title: Interpretation of a dream about mountain and water

preview.html: Meeting a mountain and water together has a special awe, whether in a dream or in reality, and through our topic today from our interpreter website, we will learn about the positive and negative meanings of seeing mountains and water, so stay with us. Interpretation of seeing a mountain and water in a dream for one girl. Black water that comes out of the mountain in a dream is a sign of... Danger. Drinking black water in a dream is illness and harm to the body. Seeing high mountains surrounded by fresh water from every direction. Signing marriage to an ambitious man and giving birth to many children. See also: Interpretation of seeing water in a dream and its meaning in detail. Interpretation of seeing a mountain and water in a dream for a married woman. If A married woman climbed a mountain with her husband until they both reached the top. It is a sign that she is completing her life together and facing challenges and obstacles together for a better future for them and their children. When a woman sees her husband giving her water that flows from the foot of the mountain, it is good luck that she will become pregnant soon. Seeing green plants on a mountain in a dream is comfort, peace, and a stable life. Interpretation of seeing a mountain and water in a dream about a man and its meaning. Seeing a mountain and water shows weakness. Whoever drowns in water and sees a mountain and climbs it and survives drowning, it is good news for his condition, and God knows best. And whoever sees in his dream that He is standing on a high mountain, and suddenly the mountain collapses, and the dreamer falls into the water, then this is a sign of failure and disappointment. The meaning of seeing a mountain and water in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation If a woman sits in front of a mountain in a dream, and looks at it with awe and fear. She feels very anxious and tense during this time because of problems Pregnancy and many ideas about childbirth. A mountain in a dream indicates the birth of a boy, and water expresses comfort after fatigue and misery, and safety for her and her child, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a mountain and water in a dream for young people and its meaning: The appearance of a mountain covered with grass in a dream, and around it is a lot of clear water. A sign of increased goodness and abundance of food and halal money. Seeing a mountain full of cracks in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is standing on soft ground. This is what makes his steps unstable, and his endeavors in life few. Falling from a mountain into water and being able to swim. A sign that the dreamer He does not give in to the bad circumstances that surround him and always tries to change his reality. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about a mountain for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about water coming out of a mountain in a dream. Seeing water coming out of a mountain in a dream is good news of comfort, an end to adversity, ease of affairs, and an abundance of food, God willing. And whoever sees Water flowing from a mountain in a dream, then God changes his circumstances for the better, improves his situation, and gives him what he wants. Seeing a well inside a mountain in a dream indicates the fulfillment of unattainable hopes, and the collapse of worries and sorrows without return, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a mountain with snow in a dream Mountains Snow in a dream symbolizes good luck, near happiness, and a stable life full of comfort and stability. Whoever climbs a mountain of snow in a dream will gain knowledge and benefits in his life that benefit people.

And whoever sees Water flowing from a mountain in a dream, then God changes his circumstances for the better, improves his situation, and gives him what he wants. Seeing a well inside a mountain in a dream indicates the fulfillment of unattainable hopes, and the collapse of worries and sorrows without return, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a mountain with snow in a dream Mountains Snow in a dream symbolizes good luck, near happiness, and a stable life full of comfort and stability. Whoever climbs a mountain of snow in a dream will gain knowledge and benefits in his life that benefit people.

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of olive oil in a dream is the correct comprehensive interpretation

preview.html: In the following article, we will explain to you what is the interpretation of olive oil in a dream for a single woman, according to what the great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin mentioned in his book Interpretation of Dreams. Olive oil is one of the types of oils that is characterized by its high nutritional value. An unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is putting it on her hair, or she sees in her dream that she is pouring it on her hair. The vision in detail is for an unmarried person, so follow us. Interpretation of olive oil in a dream for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin. The scholar says The great Muhammad ibn Sirin: Seeing olive oil in a dream is one of the visions that carries good and good connotations and indicates that changes will occur in the dreamer’s life and all of them will be changes for the better. If the dreamer is suffering from an illness, and sees olive oil in his dream, this is good news for him that God He will be cured of all evil in the near future. We see olive oil in a dream, which indicates the death of the problems and fears that the dreamer suffers from in his life. If the dreamer commits a lot of sins and disobedience, and sees olive oil in his dream, then this vision has a good connotation, and it indicates that the dreamer will repent and return to his life. God, and that God Almighty will accept his repentance. And to see giving olive oil to others in a dream predicts the dreamer hearing happy news and the emergence of events that bring joy to his heart. This vision also shows the fortune of the fortuneteller. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is eating olive oil with bread, this is a sign of well-being and wealth. Wealth and good luck. But if the sleeper sees in his dream that olive oil is spilled on the ground, this is an unpleasant vision and an indication of hatred. It indicates the arrival of problems and sorrows in the dreamer’s life, and this vision also indicates the loss of money. Interpretation of seeing olive oil in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees olive oil in her dream, this is a good vision that portends the imminent date of her marriage to a man who respects morals and religion. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a bottle filled with olive oil, this is evidence that the dreamer is good. Creation and religion, and it also shows that the dreamer is a girl with a tender and affectionate heart. If an unmarried girl dreams during sleep that she is drinking olive oil, this is a good vision that indicates a change in appearance for many changes in her life, and they will all be positive changes, and this vision also indicates Psychological stability. The state in which the dreamer lives. But if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is pouring olive oil on the ground, this is an unpleasant vision that shows the wrong decisions made by the dreamer and warns her of the need to think carefully before making any new decision, so as not to lose good opportunities from them. Interpretation of a dream about putting olive oil on hair: Seeing olive oil put on hair in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates good luck and abundant nutrition. This vision also shows that the girl to whom Ali belongs has many ambitions and goals that she seeks to achieve. Dream interpretation scholars say that if An unmarried girl dreams that she is putting olive oil on her hair, as this is a good vision for her

title: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream via the website vision roy2a.com Surat Al-Ikhlas is a Meccan surah that has four verses and is found in the thirtieth part of the Holy Qur’an. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream according to great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, according to the condition of the dreamer. Follow us. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained the vision of reading Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream. It indicates that the dreamer is close to his Lord and is on the right path in his life. Seeing the recitation of Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream indicates that God will bless the dreamer with a lot of goodness and sustenance in His life. Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream may indicate that the dreamer is exposed to a calamity in his life related to procreation, and God knows best. See other interpretations: The interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Tahrim in a dream. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing the verse of Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream, which indicates that the dreamer performs all the duties assigned to him. He is religious to the utmost extent, and abstains from desires and temptations. Seeing the recitation of Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream indicates that the dreamer has achieved all his ambitions and goals after long patience. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq. Imam Al-Sadiq explained that he saw Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream. It shows that some bad things will happen. In the life of the dreamer in the coming period. Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream indicates that the dreamer is patient and bears all the bad deeds that he faces from some of those close to him. Seeing Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream announces that he will fulfill all his long-awaited desires. Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream It indicates that the monarch is a good and loyal person. Religion. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing Surat Hud in a dream. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried woman reading Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream. It indicates that God will bless her with a lot of goodness, sustenance, and blessings in her life. Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream for an unmarried woman. It indicates that God will grant her a wish that she has been trying and wanting to fulfill for a while. Seeing an unmarried woman repeating Surah Al-Ikhlas in a dream announces that a righteous young man with good intentions will propose to her. Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream for an unmarried woman. Perhaps it indicates that many positive changes will occur in his life soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of the vision Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman reading Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream shows that something happy will happen in her life in the coming period. Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream about a married woman. It indicates the end of all worries and anxieties in her life. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Ikhlas in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman reciting Surah Al-Ikhlas repeatedly in a dream indicates that she will undergo an easy and accessible birth process and will not suffer from fatigue or pain. Surah Al-Ikhlas in a dream about a pregnant woman shows that she will get rid of all evil people in her life. See other interpretations: Interpretation of seeing Surah Al-Waqi’ah in a dream. We are happy to see the reception of your dream with “ Seeing Surah A

title: Interpretation of raisins in a dream: Seeing raisins in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of raisins for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married man or a bachelor, whether black or red, eating, buying, giving gifts, etc. according to Ibn Sirin, the comprehensive imam. - Raisins Al-Sadiq and Nabulsi Raisins: denote food. Raisins are the origin of grapes, and denote the sustenance of a stock or inheritance that is vulnerable to the death of its owner. If you see raisins in a dream or dream, it symbolizes some negative forces that are working against you. If you dream that you are eating raisins, this means that despair will affect you. Achieving your dreams. Raisins: All black, red, and white are good and wealth. Eating raisins is food. May God bless you, God willing. Buying raisins means that you will have a source of livelihood, and it is a source of livelihood that requires a little patience to obtain. Picking raisins from the ground indicates inheritance or something that is not significant. Interpretation of eating raisins in a dream. An unmarried woman who sees herself eating raisins indicates the good news that she will receive. A married woman who sees herself eating raisins indicates that her livelihood has been damaged. A pregnant woman who sees herself eating raisins indicates the blessing of a newborn. A man who sees himself eating raisins indicates halal money or moving to a new job. Interpretation of buying Raisins in a dream Single people who see themselves buying raisins, this indicates successful choices and correct decisions in matters of passion or the future in general. Buying raisins in a married woman’s dream portends a new pregnancy or opens the door to livelihood, and it is said that the family’s complete success. As for buying raisins in a pregnant woman’s dream, its meaning It is good and symbolizes her safety and the blessing of her pregnancy. Interpretation of distributing raisins in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he is distributing raisins to people will enjoy love and acceptance, and his livelihood or wealth may increase. Giving raisins, receiving them, and donating them in a dream: An unmarried woman who saw in her dream that she was giving raisins to someone she loved and then accepted the marriage. Or an engaged and married woman who sees in her dream that she is taking raisins from her husband and then becomes pregnant and the pregnant woman. A woman who sees in her dream that a stranger or an acquaintance gives her a gift of raisins means that a wish in her heart will come true, and that a pleasant and joyful event will soon fill her heart with joy, and it may be related to pregnancy and childbirth. It may be related to issues of living and money. Another interpretation of a dream about raisins: Raisins show many happy interpretations of different colors, as they show a bright future for those who dream, and interpretation scholars have confirmed that there is a lot of goodness for those who think about the dream, as it is an improvement for the person’s future and life. Live, as the interpretation differs for women and men and we present this in detail today. Interpretation of a dream about raisins for a single woman When an unmarried girl sees raisins in a dream, this is evidence of the goodness and happiness that she will receive in her upcoming future, and buying them indicates success and making the right decisions regarding situations related to emotion And love. Give raisins to someone or someone you love, so it will be a wedding or engagement for her. Interpretation of a dream about raisins for a married womanWhen a woman sees a

title: Interpretation of dreams that I bought gold by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I dreamed that I bought gold indicates many interpretations and meanings that differ from one vision to another depending on the situation in which the dreamer appears in the dream and the problems that he may suffer from in reality, as well as the various events that occur in the vision, and through our article we will present the most important interpretations shown in the dream of buying gold. I dreamed that I bought gold. Seeing buying gold in a dream means a lot of goodness that the dreamer will receive soon and get rid of all the material problems that he suffers from. Seeing buying gold from a famous place in a dream indicates that the material conditions of the pioneer will improve and he will live in prosperity during the coming period. The person who He sees in a dream that he is buying large amounts of gold, then this is evidence that he will soon find a new job through which he will make a large profit. Seeing buying gold and being happy in a dream means that the dreamer will get rid of all the worries that he is currently suffering from and live happily. If one sees in a dream that There is an unknown man who gives him a large amount of gold, as this is evidence that he will overcome all the difficulties he is going through at the present time. To see yourself buying gold and then selling it in a dream means that the dreamer will suffer from some shocks in the coming period, which will cause him great sadness. I dreamed that I bought gold for Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing gold in a dream indicates an improvement in the pioneer’s financial conditions and that he will be relieved of all his worries. Seeing buying gold in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation means that he overcomes all obstacles and achieves all the dreams he seeks in life. Whoever sees in his dream that he is buying gold from somewhere and feels happy, this is evidence that he will live a peaceful life and achieve great material gains. Buying gold from an unknown place and crying in a dream indicates positive changes that will occur in the dreamer’s life and as a result they will live happily. What is the interpretation of buying gold? Gold in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq? Imam Al-Sadiq explained that seeing gold in a dream means that the dreamer will achieve everything he seeks. A person who dreams that he is buying gold for someone he loves indicates that he will take some serious steps soon. Seeing yourself buying gold in a dream and feeling happy means that The dreamer will face a big problem and overcome it quickly. Seeing yourself buying gold and feeling afraid in a dream indicates that there are some wrong actions being done by the fortuneteller and he must be very careful. Seeing gold being stolen from somewhere and feeling sad means that the dreamer will face a big problem at work. And he will need help. I dreamed that I bought gold for individuals. To dream that you buy gold from an individual gold store means that you will hear some good news about the future and that you will make more profits in the field of work. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is buying gold from a place she does not know, then this Evidence that she will get into big trouble and will need help. Seeing that she is buying gold from someone and feeling sad means that the dreamer will not realize some dreams. Seeing that there is a certain person buying gold for single people,

Seeing buying gold in a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation means that he overcomes all obstacles and achieves all the dreams he seeks in life. Whoever sees in his dream that he is buying gold from somewhere and feels happy, this is evidence that he will live a peaceful life and achieve great material gains. Buying gold from an unknown place and crying in a dream indicates positive changes that will occur in the dreamer’s life and as a result they will live happily. What is the interpretation of buying gold? Gold in a dream for Imam Al-Sadiq? Imam Al-Sadiq explained that seeing gold in a dream means that the dreamer will achieve everything he seeks. A person who dreams that he is buying gold for someone he loves indicates that he will take some serious steps soon. Seeing yourself buying gold in a dream and feeling happy means that The dreamer will face a big problem and overcome it quickly. Seeing yourself buying gold and feeling afraid in a dream indicates that there are some wrong actions being done by the fortuneteller and he must be very careful. Seeing gold being stolen from somewhere and feeling sad means that the dreamer will face a big problem at work. And he will need help. I dreamed that I bought gold for individuals. To dream that you buy gold from an individual gold store means that you will hear some good news about the future and that you will make more profits in the field of work. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is buying gold from a place she does not know, then this Evidence that she will get into big trouble and will need help. Seeing that she is buying gold from someone and feeling sad means that the dreamer will not realize some dreams. Seeing that there is a certain person buying gold for single people,
